website_summaries.verdict: These natural cork charms are gentle on your glass and give it a beautiful, rustic look.
pros: Cork charms each have a wine-related pun that everyone will enjoy
Cork gives a natural, rustic look to your wine glass
Charms are lightweight and won't scratch or damage the glass
Charms come in a convenient storage box
cons: Charms all look nearly identical, not ideal for quickly telling your drink apart

customer_reviews.title: Makes me Want to Drink More!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these! I used them as tags for some goodie bags for my sisters bachelorette party/some guy gifts for the wine themed wedding. They are silly and cute and really multifunctional!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great to recognize YOUR drink among the others. corks are durable and have accidentally withstood the dishwasher too! Just fun!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a party
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of cheap looking but they were perfect to lay around my table Italian table runner with decorations to dress up the table. People liked the sayings and many of them took them home with them. (Which I did not mind because they were inexpensive)
customer_reviews.author: Traci Campbell

customer_reviews.title: NOT 12 different designs but still a worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT get 12 different designs. I got 2 of the same one: cloud wine. Not worth returning, but false advertising or perhaps bad packaging/quality control? Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Clever
customer_reviews.text: Used these at a recent dinner party and our guests had so much fun choosing their charms. Our Christmas guests even used them on the handles of their coffee mugs to distinguish between similar mugs. Well-made and easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan reader

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: A few of my friends are getting these cute little glass charms. Fun gift, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and everyone loved them. We didn't get our glasses mixed up as long as we could remember which one picked. However, they break easily. It is attached by a tiny screw into the cork. I would still buy them though because it was a hit and helped a big group keep track of their glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good wine gift
customer_reviews.text: Used them with burlap wine bags bought on amazon they matched perfectly. They have cut sayings. I was happy to gift them.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: we loved our wine glass charms. our guests love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: The charms tear off....
customer_reviews.text: Super cute however when attempting to place the charms on the wine glass, they could immediately tore on 4 of them. There is no way to fix them once they tear.
customer_reviews.author: MegGoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for gift giving to wine lovers! Cute sayings and fit all stems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sister for Christmas and she loves them. They turned out great, look exactly like pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Made such great favors for a bridal shower I hosted. Really great quality! Love the variety of sayings. Really great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Katelin Laster

customer_reviews.title: wine not ?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, the person absolutely loved it! definitely buying a few more to have as stocking stuffers and just because gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn

customer_reviews.title: So funny
customer_reviews.text: Good gift. The sayings are so funny. I would give them again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely ‘Charm’ing!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product; perfect size for wine charms and easy to read. Words are imprinted onto the cork disc, not a stick-on. Very nice quality. I will not hesitate to order these again!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice add to party favors for a friends bridal shower
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Saffold

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great funny gift for friends who love wine.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyD

customer_reviews.title: Fun wine charms
customer_reviews.text: These were so fun, and fit my purpose perfectly. We all went on a wine tour and I made little gifts for everyone with these attached, everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cyganovich

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Exactly as pictured. Great quality and you cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good to have!
customer_reviews.text: I have them for a year, they work well. Not easy at one glance to see which one is yours but it’s more authentic than a plastic ring and it makes people talk or when they pick the quote.
customer_reviews.author: Amelie

customer_reviews.title: Hurray
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present and they seemed to like it.

customer_reviews.title: Aged to Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to and “Aged to Perfection” themed birthday party.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking-fun
customer_reviews.text: Using in a basket for a fun raiser. Very cute

customer_reviews.title: Great addition!
customer_reviews.text: A great hit for painting with a twist party for my sister!

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: The firm separates easily from the charm, lost them quickly.

customer_reviews.title: My friend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend who loved it. Packaged quite well and fit great around the stem of her wine lasses

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted. Added the perfect charm that I was looking for. Made a awesome gift!

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Made a lovely gift for my wine drinking friends. Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Cute sayings
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's girlfriend, she thought that they were really cute.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE. For my guests and as a gift along with a bottle of wine !

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t impressed with these, thought they were expensive for what you got

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a party gift! Super cute sayings on the wine charms! I need to buy one for myself now!!!
customer_reviews.author: SMH1106

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! All the guests love them. Easy to remove.

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely adorable and fun for wine tasting parties at home to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable and fun for wine tasting parties at home to help guests keep track of their wine glass.

customer_reviews.title: They made a fun bridal shower favor
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. They made a fun bridal shower favor.

product_meta.title: Funny Wine Glass Charms (Cork, 12 Pack)
feature_bullets: FULL SET: This set contains 12 natural cork wine charms and features 12 different designs. Designed to liven up any drinking experience with friends or relatives. Effortless to attach to your glassware with the easy-to-hook loop attachment method. Pull apart the loop to hook or unlock

VARIED DESIGNS: The 12 designs are: "wine o'clock", "GOT WINE", "I wine A LOT", "wine not", "wine down", "LIQUID therapy", "cloud wine", "pour delicious", "wine a little", "wine me up", "winoholic", and "yes way Rose". Just the thing for a reunion with friends, BBQ or family gathering!
IDEAL GIFT: Makes for an excellent gift exchange idea or birthday gift for that one wine lover friend or family member!
PLEASE NOTE: Not for stemless glasses or tumblers
DIMENSIONS: Each charm is 1 inches in diameter and 0.19 inches thick

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars250 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
